name: 方博杰
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
WEEK	DATE	CONTENT		ASSIGNMENTS
			
1	Sept. 11 / Sept. 13	Syllabus / Ch. 1	
2	Sept. 18 / Sept. 20	Ch. 2	Workbook/Handouts
3	Sept. 25 / Sept. 27	Ch. 3	Workbook/Handouts
4	Oct. 02 / Oct. 04	Ch. 4 / No class	Workbook/Handouts
5	Oct. 09 / Oct. 11	No class / Practice 	Handouts
6	Oct. 16 / Oct. 18	Ch. 5	Workbook/Handouts
7	Oct. 23 / Oct. 25	Ch. 6	Workbook/Handouts
8	Oct. 30 / Nov. 01	Practice and revise	Handouts
9	Nov. 06 / Nov. 08	Mid-term week	
10	Nov. 13 / Nov. 15	Ch. 7	Workbook/Handouts
11	Nov. 20 / Nov. 22	Ch. 8	Workbook/Handouts
12	Nov. 27 / Nov. 29	Ch. 9	Workbook/Handouts
13	Dec. 04 / Dec. 06	Ch. 10	Workbook/Handouts
14	Dec. 11 / Dec. 13	Ch. 11	Workbook/Handouts
15	Dec. 18 / Dec. 20	Ch. 12	Workbook/Handouts
16	Dec. 25 / Dec. 27	Practice and revise	Handouts
17	Jan. 01 / Jan. 03	No class / Practice	Handouts
18	Jan. 08 / Jan. 10	Final Exam	
19	Jan. 15 / Jan. 17	Winter break begins
scorePolicy:
Attendance and Participation (class and group discussions) – 40%
Homework and assignments – 40%
Midterm and Final Exam – 20%
materials:
